message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  That's a bit too high for my budget though.  Would you consider $105?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is much higher. How about we meet in the middle at $175?
I appreciate you working with me Alice, but $175 is still a bit too steep for me. How about $120?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be fair, I can't go any lower than $145.  This is a very good deal for the value you'll get.
